query: select `assets`.* from `assets` where `assets`.`deleted_at` is null and `id` in (?, ?)

select `coverages`.*, `asset_coverages`.`asset_id` as `pivot_asset_id`, `asset_coverages`.`coverage_id` as `pivot_coverage_id`, `asset_coverages`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `asset_coverages`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `coverages` inner join `asset_coverages` on `coverages`.`id` = `asset_coverages`.`coverage_id` where `asset_coverages`.`deleted_at` is null and `asset_coverages`.`asset_id` in (?, ?) and `coverages`.`deleted_at` is null
select `contacts`.* from `contacts` where `contacts`.`object_id` in (?, ?) and `contacts`.`object_type` = ? and `contacts`.`deleted_at` is null
select `asset_warranties`.* from `asset_warranties` where `asset_warranties`.`asset_id` in (?, ?) and `asset_warranties`.`deleted_at` is null
select `documents`.* from `documents` where `documents`.`id` in (?, ?, ?) and `documents`.`deleted_at` is null

select `statuses`.*, `document_statuses`.`document_id` as `pivot_document_id`, `document_statuses`.`status_id` as `pivot_status_id`, `document_statuses`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `document_statuses`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `statuses` inner join `document_statuses` on `statuses`.`id` = `document_statuses`.`status_id` where `document_statuses`.`deleted_at` is null and `document_statuses`.`document_id` in (?, ?, ?) and `statuses`.`deleted_at` is null
